trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the subject of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token is granted access to a given resource.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否的主旨<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>給定資源的存取權授與安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Use the SamlAccessDecision to express access permissions to a resource in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> within a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: 使用快速存取之資源的權限 SamlAccessDecision<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>內<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>安全性權杖。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that access to a resource is denied.

Specifies that the security token service that issued the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token does not have enough information to determine the access permissions for a particular resource.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安全性權杖服務發出<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>安全性權杖並沒有足夠的資訊來判斷特定資源的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: A recipient of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token must use other means to determine the user's access permissions.
trans-unit.target: 收件者<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>安全性權杖必須使用其他方法來判斷使用者的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that access to a resource is granted.
trans-unit.target: 指定資源的存取權授與。
